'''Wavesmasher Locomotive''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Wavesmasher Locomotive is obtainable from  [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=240}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Cypress Wood = 8
|White Iron Chunk = 4
|Red Dye = 4
|sort = Cypress Wood;White Iron Chunk;Red Dye
}}
